tweet_text: @metteharrison I have been working on this. I’m trying to treat myself the way I treat my kids. I picture the little kid version of myself and use the same inner voice that I use on them. How should a kid be treated? With patience, empathy, kindness, etc. Not being rushed and scolded 24/7.
